document.full_text: lana lawless, the transgender woman who sued the l.p.g.a. and the long drivers of america last october challenging their rule that competitors be 'female at birth,' has settled her case, her lawyer said.
document.title: sports briefing | golf: transgender woman settles suit against two organizations
lines_and_colors: lana lawless, the transgender woman who sued the l.p.g.a. and the long drivers of america last october challenging their rule that competitors be 'female at birth,' has settled her case, her lawyer said.
